channel.title: CVE Feed for Technicolor -- CGA2121
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Technicolor -- CGA2121

item.title: CVE-2024-3780|2024-04-15T11:20:26.263Z -- Technicolor -- CGA2121
item.description: A vulnerability of Information Exposure has been found on Technicolor CGA2121 affecting the version 1.01, this vulnerability allows a local attacker to obtain sensitive information stored on the device such as wifi network's SSID and their respective passwords.
